<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Set the hot-spot of a screen to a given coordinate. The hot-spot is the position within the screen where the Screen Offset will have effect and around which rotation will be done
## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the screen, if ommited the instruction will affect the current screen.
- **xSpot**: The horizontal position of the hot-spot
- **ySpot**: The vertical position of the hot-spot
